name: Bed status
description: HL7-defined table specifying the state of a bed in an inpatient setting to determine patient assignment eligibility

values.definition: Bed is closed and unavailable for patient assignment
Bed requires housekeeping services before patient assignment
Bed is designated for isolation purposes
Bed is contaminated and requires decontamination
Bed is currently occupied by a patient
Bed is available for patient assignment

notes: Case-sensitive code system used to determine if a patient may be assigned to a bed. Essential for bed management and patient placement workflows.

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal bed status categories for specialized units
vendorVariations.cerner: Uses standard values with organization-specific extensions for different care areas
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard implementation with optional department-specific bed status indicators
